---
title: "Dashboard"
output: html_document
---

```{r message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("ny_noaa")

clean_df = ny_noaa %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    year = lubridate::year(date),
    month = lubridate::month(date),
    day = lubridate::day(date),
    prcp = prcp / 10,
    snow = snow / 10,
    snwd = snwd / 10,
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax) / 10,
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin) / 10
  )
```
